prefs.label: Video Camera Flashlight
prefs.help: This enables/disables the video camera flashlight

prefs.label: Shutter Sound
prefs.help: This enables/disables the sound effect when taking a photo

prefs.label: Capture with volume keys
prefs.help: This enables/disables the ability to take photos using the volume keys

prefs.label: Self-timer value 1 (seconds)
prefs.help: This allows configuration of 1 of the available self-timer values.  The default values are 0, 3, 5, and 10 seconds.  The timing for 0 seconds is not configurable.

prefs.label: Self-timer value 2 (seconds)
prefs.help: This allows configuration of 1 of the available self-timer values.  The default values are 0, 3, 5, and 10 seconds.  The timing for 0 seconds is not configurable.

prefs.label: Self-timer value 3 (seconds)
prefs.help: This allows configuration of 1 of the available self-timer values.  The default values are 0, 3, 5, and 10 seconds.  The timing for 0 seconds is not configurable.

prefs.label: Burst Delay (milliseconds)
prefs.help: The delay between shutter releases.  Values below 2000 milliseconds may not work properly if the flash is enabled

prefs.label: Burst Count Value 1
prefs.help: This allows configuration of 1 of the available frame burst values.  The default values are 1x, 2x and 3x.  The timing for 1x is not configurable.

prefs.label: Burst Count Value 2
prefs.help: This allows configuration of 1 of the available frame burst values.  The default values are 1x, 2x and 3x.  The timing for 1x is not configurable.
